contest-event.event-date: March 11, 1950 D Midlands Area (Championship Section) Midlands Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Championship Festival Overture [Geehl] Albert Hall, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England, UK 10 bands competed. Feb. 17, 2011, 2:11 p.m. Feb. 17, 2014, 12:43 p.m. 1 Ransome Band Eric Ball 2 City of Coventry Eric Ball 3 Creswell Colliery Band Alex Mortimer 4 The GUS Band Stanley Boddington 5 City of Birmingham Band Harry Heyes Unknown Result Bolsover Colliery S.
